ground_truth: The cars drive around the pair and stop, creating a cloud of dust that hangs in the air. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men get out of their cars, and Hani gestures for Marwan to open the door for Ferris to get out. Ferris watches Hani walk up to the kneeling figure and take off the hood, then dial a cell phone. Karami takes the phone, and Hani goes to Ferris. Karami hangs up, and Hani takes the phone back while Karami stares up at him. Karami stands, and Hani kisses his cheeks. One of the men gives Karami a bicycle, and he leaves. Hani strolls over to Ferris, who nods thoughtfully. Later, Ferris, walking back to his apartment, is on the phone and sees someone in his apartment. Two SUVs drive through gates and stop in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, where Ferris and Hoffman get out of the vehicles and head along corridors to join Hani in the meeting room. Hoffman smiles tightly, sits, and puts a photograph on the table, staring at Hani, who glances at Ferris. In the SUV, Hoffman smokes a fat cigar and has a drink with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment, while kids play football on the patch of ground in front of the safe house. Skip stands amidst the market as Karami, dressed in dark trousers, a pale cream shirt, waistcoat, and skullcap, emerges from a doorway and walks through the market. Seeing him, Skip talks into an earpiece. Wearing shades, Karami walks purposefully through the marketplace with Skip following him. Karami takes off his shades and reads a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street with Skip on his tail. Further down the street, a van is reversing. Karami slows up, glances down at his paper, and looks round at Skip, who throws out his hands. Karami darts between the van and a building, running down side streets as the van blocks Skip's way. Two men jump out, and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward. Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the street, but Karami is gone. Ferris sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha the nurse walks in, jabs a needle in his stomach, and walks out. He follows her, passing densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs. Hordes of people swarm on the street, where traders sell produce from barrows. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha, who wears a headscarf, and they are photographed. At a clinic, Ferris sits in a waiting room with a group of women and children; some women look at him curiously and smile. Emerging from her room, Aisha smiles at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: The automobiles travel around the duo and halt, forming a haze of dirt that lingers in the atmosphere. Marwan, Hani, and the remainder of the males exit their automobiles, and Hani motions for Marwan to unlock the portal for Ferris to exit. Ferris observes Hani stride up to the crouching person and remove the covering, then dial a mobile device. Karami accepts the device, and Hani proceeds to Ferris. Karami disconnects, and Hani retrieves the device while Karami gazes up at him. Karami rises, and Hani pecks his cheeks. One of the males hands Karami a cycle, and he departs. Hani saunters over to Ferris, who acknowledges thoughtfully. Subsequently, Ferris, ambling back to his residence, is on the device and perceives someone in his residence. Two SUVs journey through entrances and halt in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, where Ferris and Hoffman exit the transports and proceed along passages to join Hani in the consultation chamber. Hoffman grins stiffly, seated, and places a photo on the surface, gazing at Hani, who peers at Ferris. In the SUV, Hoffman puffs a hefty stogie and has a beverage with Ferris on the veranda of his residence, while children play soccer on the patch of land in front of the secure dwelling. Skip stands amid the bazaar as Karami, attired in dark slacks, a light cream blouse, vest, and skullcap, emerges from an entryway and strides through the bazaar. Seeing him, Skip communicates into an earpiece. Sporting sunglasses, Karami strolls deliberately through the marketplace with Skip trailing him. Karami removes his sunglasses and peruses a periodical as he walks down a narrow path with Skip on his tail. Further along the path, a van is reversing. Karami decelerates, glances down at his periodical, and looks round at Skip, who throws out his hands. Karami darts between the van and a structure, sprinting down side paths as the van obstructs Skip's path. Two males leap out, and Skip pounds on the portal before the van advances. Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the path, but Karami is vanished. Ferris rests on the cot in a treatment chamber at the wellness clinic when Aisha the nurse enters, jabs a needle in his abdomen, and exits. He follows her, passing densely packed concrete edifices with ramshackle flat roofs. Crowds of people swarm on the path, where vendors peddle goods from carts. Ferris strolls along the path with Aisha, who dons a headscarf, and they are photographed. At a clinic, Ferris sits in a waiting area with a collection of women and children; some women regard him curiously and grin. Emerging from her chamber, Aisha beams at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: The cars maneuver around the pair and come to a halt, creating a swirling cloud of dust that lingers in the air, suspended like a veil. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men exit their vehicles, and Hani makes a gesture, signaling for Marwan to open the door so that Ferris can step out. Ferris observes as Hani approaches the kneeling figure, removes the hood, and then proceeds to dial a number on a cell phone. Karami takes the phone from him, and Hani returns to Ferris. After Karami finishes the call, Hani retrieves the phone while Karami looks up at him with a steady gaze. Karami rises to his feet, and Hani greets him with a traditional kiss on the cheeks. One of the men hands Karami a bicycle, and he departs. Hani then leisurely walks over to Ferris, who nods in a thoughtful manner. Later on, as Ferris makes his way back to his apartment, he is on the phone and notices someone inside his apartment. Two SUVs drive through the gates and come to a stop in front of the imposing Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate. Ferris and Hoffman exit the vehicles and proceed along the corridors to join Hani in the meeting room. Hoffman offers a tight smile, takes a seat, and places a photograph on the table, fixing his gaze on Hani, who in turn glances at Ferris. Inside the SUV, Hoffman enjoys a fat cigar and shares a drink with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment, while children play football on the patch of ground in front of the safe house. Skip stands amidst the bustling market as Karami, dressed in dark trousers, a pale cream shirt, a waistcoat, and a skullcap, emerges from a doorway and makes his way through the market. Upon seeing him, Skip speaks into an earpiece. Wearing shades, Karami strides purposefully through the marketplace with Skip trailing behind him. Karami removes his shades and reads a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street, with Skip following closely. Further down the street, a van is reversing. Karami slows his pace, glances down at his paper, and looks back at Skip, who throws up his hands in frustration. Karami darts between the van and a building, sprinting down side streets as the van obstructs Skip's path. Two men leap out, and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward. Skip squeezes through the gap and races down the street, but Karami has vanished. Ferris sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha, the nurse, enters, administers a needle into his stomach, and then exits. He follows her, passing by densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs. Crowds of people swarm the street, where traders sell produce from barrows. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha, who is wearing a headscarf, and they are photographed. At the clinic, Ferris sits in a waiting room filled with a group of women and children; some of the women glance at him with curiosity and smile. Emerging from her room, Aisha smiles warmly at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: The cars deftly maneuver around the pair and come to a halt in a choreographed fashion, sending up a swirling cloud of dust that hangs in the air, suspended like a delicate veil of mystery. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men make their way out of their vehicles, and Hani, with a subtle but clear gesture, signals for Marwan to open the door, allowing Ferris to step out of the car. Ferris stands by and observes as Hani approaches the figure who is kneeling on the ground. He removes the hood from the kneeling figure, then proceeds to dial a number on a cell phone with a practiced hand. Karami takes the phone from him, and Hani makes his way back to Ferris. Once Karami completes the call, Hani retrieves the phone, all the while Karami looks up at him with a steady and unwavering gaze. Rising to his feet, Karami is greeted by Hani with a traditional kiss on both cheeks. One of the men steps forward and hands Karami a bicycle, on which he promptly departs. Hani then casually strolls over to Ferris, who nods in a thoughtful and reflective manner. Later on, as Ferris is making his return to his apartment, he is engaged in a phone conversation and notices someone inside his apartment. Two large SUVs drive through the gates and come to a stop before the grand and imposing edifice of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate. Ferris and Hoffman exit the vehicles and walk purposefully along the corridors to join Hani in the designated meeting room. Hoffman offers a tight-lipped smile, takes a seat with an air of authority, and places a photograph on the table, fixing his gaze intently on Hani, who then glances over at Ferris. While inside the SUV, Hoffman indulges in a rich, fat cigar and shares a drink leisurely with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment. Meanwhile, children enthusiastically play football on the patch of ground right in front of the safe house. Amidst the bustling and lively market, Skip stands as Karami, who is dressed smartly in dark trousers, a pale cream shirt, a waistcoat, and a skullcap, emerges from a doorway and makes his way through the lively marketplace. Upon catching sight of him, Skip speaks into an earpiece with urgency. Wearing stylish shades, Karami strides purposefully through the busy market with Skip trailing intently behind him. Karami removes his shades and peruses a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street, with Skip following closely behind. Further along the street, a van is seen reversing. Karami slows his pace, casting a glance down at his paper, and looks back at Skip, who throws up his hands in frustration. In a swift movement, Karami darts between the van and a building, sprinting down the narrow side streets as the van blocks Skip's path. Two men leap out of the van, and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward again. Skip manages to squeeze through the narrow gap and races down the street, but Karami has by then vanished from sight. Ferris finds himself sitting on the bed in a quiet treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha, the nurse, enters, administers a needle into his stomach with practiced ease, and then leaves the room. He follows her, passing by densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs, characteristic of the area. Crowds of people swarm the bustling street, where traders energetically sell produce from their barrows. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha, who is wearing a traditional headscarf, and they are surreptitiously photographed. At the clinic, Ferris sits in a waiting room filled with a group of women and children; some of the women glance at him with curiosity in their eyes and offer him friendly smiles. Emerging from her room, Aisha smiles warmly and reassuringly at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: The cars, coated in a layer of desert dust typical of the region's dry climate, drive around the pair and stop, creating a cloud of dust that hangs in the air. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men, known for their roles in clandestine operations, get out of their cars, and Hani gestures for Marwan to open the door for Ferris to get out. Ferris, an intelligence officer with a keen eye for detail, watches Hani walk up to the kneeling figure and take off the hood, revealing the captive’s face, then dial a cell phone, likely a secure line for sensitive communications. Karami, a trusted operative within the network, takes the phone, and Hani goes to Ferris. Karami hangs up, and Hani takes the phone back while Karami stares up at him. In a traditional display of respect, Karami stands, and Hani kisses his cheeks. One of the men, following pre-arranged plans, gives Karami a bicycle, a discreet mode of transport, and he leaves. Hani strolls over to Ferris, who nods thoughtfully, considering the implications of their meeting. Later, Ferris, walking back to his modestly furnished apartment in a bustling district, is on the phone and sees someone in his apartment, raising his suspicions. Two armored SUVs drive through heavily secured gates and stop in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, the central hub for national security operations, where Ferris and Hoffman get out of the vehicles and head along corridors designed for security to join Hani in the meeting room, a place of strategic significance. Hoffman smiles tightly, sits, and puts a photograph on the table, a common practice in intelligence for identifying targets, staring at Hani, who glances at Ferris. In the SUV, Hoffman smokes a fat cigar, a trademark of his character, and has a drink with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment, while kids play football on the patch of ground in front of the safe house, a frequent scene in urban neighborhoods. Skip stands amidst the market, a bustling hub of local life, as Karami, dressed in dark trousers, a pale cream shirt, waistcoat, and skullcap, emulating local customs, emerges from a doorway and walks through the market. Seeing him, Skip talks into an earpiece, coordinating with his team. Wearing shades, Karami walks purposefully through the marketplace with Skip following him. Karami takes off his shades and reads a newspaper, a discreet way to blend in, as he walks down a narrow street with Skip on his tail. Further down the street, a van, possibly involved in covert activities, is reversing. Karami slows up, glances down at his paper, and looks round at Skip, who throws out his hands in frustration. Karami darts between the van and a building, navigating through the labyrinthine alleyways, and running down side streets as the van blocks Skip's way. Two men jump out, indicating a planned maneuver, and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward. Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the street, but Karami is gone, having skillfully evaded capture. Ferris sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic, a common setting for gathering intelligence under the guise of medical needs, when Aisha the nurse walks in, jabs a needle in his stomach, administering necessary medication, and walks out. He follows her, passing densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs, typical of urban centers. Hordes of people swarm on the street, a sign of the city's vibrant energy, where traders sell produce from barrows, offering a glimpse into local life. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha, who wears a headscarf, signifying her cultural and religious identity, and they are photographed, potentially indicating surveillance. At a clinic, Ferris sits in a waiting room with a group of women and children; some women look at him curiously and smile, perhaps intrigued by his foreign demeanor. Emerging from her room, Aisha smiles at Ferris, suggesting an established rapport between them.

Skip stands amidst the market as Karami dressed in dark trousers a pale cream shirt waistcoat and skullcap emerges from a doorway and walks through the market. Seeing him Skip talks into an earpiece. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Wearing shades Karami walks purposefully through the marketplace with Skip following him. Karami takes off his shades and reads a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street with Skip on his tail. Further down the street a van is reversing. Karami slows up glances down at his paper and looks round at Skip who throws out his hands. Karami darts between the van and a building running down side streets as the van blocks Skip's way. Two men jump out and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward. Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the street but Karami is gone. Ferris sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha the nurse walks in jabs a needle in his stomach and walks out. He follows her passing densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs. Hordes of people swarm on the street where traders sell produce from barrows. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha who wears a headscarf and they are photographed. At a clinic Ferris sits in a waiting room with a group of women and children. some women look at him curiously and smile. Emerging from her room Aisha smiles at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: The cars drive around the pair and stop creating a cloud of dust that hangs in the air. Marwan Hani and the rest of the men get out of their cars and Hani gestures for Marwan to open the door for Ferris to get out. Ferris watches Hani walk up to the kneeling figure and take off the hood then dial a cell phone. Karami takes the phone and Hani goes to Ferris. Karami hangs up and Hani takes the phone back while Karami stares up at him. Karami stands and Hani kisses his cheeks. One of the men gives Karami a bicycle and he leaves. Hani strolls over to Ferris who nods thoughtfully. Later Ferris walking back to his apartment is on the phone and sees someone in his apartment. Two SUVs drive through gates and stop in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate where Ferris and Hoffman get out of the vehicles and head along corridors to join Hani in the meeting room. Hoffman smiles tightly sits and puts a photograph on the table staring at Hani who glances at Ferris. In the SUV Hoffman smokes a fat cigar and has a drink with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment while kids play football on the patch of ground in front of the safe house. Skip stands amidst the market as Karami dressed in dark trousers a pale cream shirt waistcoat and skullcap emerges from a doorway and walks through the market. Seeing him Skip talks into an earpiece. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. Wearing shades Karami walks purposefully through the marketplace with Skip following him. Karami takes off his shades and reads a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street with Skip on his tail. Further down the street a van is reversing. Karami slows up glances down at his paper and looks round at Skip who throws out his hands. Karami darts between the van and a building running down side streets as the van blocks Skip's way. Two men jump out and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward. Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the street but Karami is gone. Ferris sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha the nurse walks in jabs a needle in his stomach and walks out. He follows her passing densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs. Hordes of people swarm on the street where traders sell produce from barrows. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha who wears a headscarf and they are photographed. At a clinic Ferris sits in a waiting room with a group of women and children. some women look at him curiously and smile. Emerging from her room Aisha smiles at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: The dogs drive around the pair and stop, creating a cloud of dust that hangs in the air. The rabbit, the turtle, and the rest of the cats get out of their cars, and the turtle gestures for the rabbit to open the door for the monkey to get out. The monkey watches the turtle walk up to the kneeling figure and take off the hood, then dial a cell phone. The parrot takes the phone, and the turtle goes to the monkey. The parrot hangs up, and the turtle takes the phone back while the parrot stares up at the turtle. The parrot stands, and the turtle kisses his cheeks. One of the cats gives the parrot a bicycle, and he leaves. The turtle strolls over to the monkey, who nods thoughtfully. Later, the monkey, walking back to his apartment, is on the phone and sees someone in his apartment. Two bicycles drive through gates and stop in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, where the monkey and the beaver get out of the vehicles and head along corridors to join the turtle in the meeting room. The beaver smiles tightly, sits, and puts a photograph on the table, staring at the turtle, who glances at the monkey. In the bicycle, the beaver smokes a fat cigar and has a drink with the monkey on the balcony of his apartment, while kids play football on the patch of ground in front of the safe house. The pigeon stands amidst the market as the parrot, dressed in dark trousers, a pale cream shirt, waistcoat, and skullcap, emerges from a doorway and walks through the market. Seeing him, the pigeon talks into an earpiece. Wearing shades, the parrot walks purposefully through the marketplace with the pigeon following him. The parrot takes off his shades and reads a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street with the pigeon on his tail. Further down the street, a truck is reversing. The parrot slows up, glances down at his paper, and looks round at the pigeon, who throws out his hands. The parrot darts between the truck and a building, running down side streets as the truck blocks the pigeon's way. Two goats jump out, and the pigeon bangs on the door before the truck moves forward. The pigeon squeezes through the gap and runs down the street, but the parrot is gone. The monkey sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha the squirrel walks in, jabs a needle in his stomach, and walks out. He follows her, passing densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs. Hordes of frogs swarm on the street, where traders sell produce from barrows. The monkey walks along the street with Aisha, who wears a headscarf, and they are photographed. At a clinic, the monkey sits in a waiting room with a group of sheep and squirrels; some sheep look at him curiously and smile. Emerging from her room, Aisha smiles at the monkey.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The bicycles glide around the pair and stop, creating a cloud of petals that hangs in the air. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men get off their bicycles, and Hani gestures for Marwan to open the window for Ferris to get out. Ferris watches Hani walk up to the kneeling figure and take off the helmet, then dial a landline. Karami takes the landline, and Hani goes to Ferris. Karami hangs up, and Hani takes the landline back while Karami stares up at him. Karami stands, and Hani kisses his knees. One of the men gives Karami a scooter, and he leaves. Hani strolls over to Ferris, who nods thoughtfully. Later, Ferris, walking back to his hotel, is on the landline and sees someone in his hotel. Two bicycles drive through arches and stop in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Library, where Ferris and Hoffman get out of the bicycles and head along halls to join Hani in the dining room. Hoffman smiles tightly, sits, and puts a postcard on the counter, staring at Hani, who glances at Ferris. In the bicycle, Hoffman smokes a long pipe and has a drink with Ferris on the veranda of his hotel, while kids play marbles on the patch of ground in front of the safe barn. Skip stands amidst the fairground as Karami, dressed in dark jeans, a pale cream jacket, waistcoat, and skullcap, emerges from a hallway and walks through the fairground. Seeing him, Skip talks into a walkie-talkie. Wearing shades, Karami walks purposefully through the fairground with Skip following him. Karami takes off his shades and reads a pamphlet as he walks down a narrow alley with Skip on his tail. Further down the alley, a cart is reversing. Karami slows up, glances down at his pamphlet, and looks round at Skip, who throws out his hands. Karami darts between the cart and a statue, running down side alleys as the cart blocks Skip's way. Two men jump out, and Skip bangs on the window before the cart moves forward. Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the alley, but Karami is gone. Ferris sits on the bed in a lounge at the wellness resort when Aisha the therapist walks in, jabs a needle in his arm, and walks out. He follows her, passing densely packed wooden huts with ramshackle tar roofs. Hordes of people swarm on the street, where traders sell produce from carts. Ferris walks along the street with Aisha, who wears a beanie, and they are photographed. At a resort, Ferris sits in a waiting area with a group of women and children; some women look at him curiously and smile. Emerging from her cabin, Aisha smiles at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: The cars circle around the pair and pause, creating a mist of dust that lingers in the air. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men climb out of their cars, and Hani signals for Marwan to press the door for Ferris to step out. Ferris observes Hani skip up to the kneeling figure and remove the hood, then punch a cell phone. Karami grabs the phone, and Hani returns to Ferris. Karami disconnects, and Hani retrieves the phone while Karami gazes up at him. Karami rises, and Hani pats his shoulders. One of the men hands Karami a skateboard, and he departs. Hani ambles over to Ferris, who winks thoughtfully. Later, Ferris, trotting back to his apartment, is on the phone and notices someone in his apartment. Two SUVs glide through gates and park in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, where Ferris and Hoffman exit the vehicles and stroll along corridors to meet Hani in the conference room. Hoffman grins tightly, sits, and slides a photograph across the table, glaring at Hani, who peeks at Ferris. In the SUV, Hoffman munches a large donut and shares a coffee with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment, while kids toss a frisbee on the patch of ground in front of the safe house. Skip stands amidst the market as Karami, dressed in dark trousers, a pale cream shirt, waistcoat, and skullcap, appears from a doorway and strolls through the market. Spotting him, Skip whispers into an earpiece. Wearing shades, Karami strides confidently through the marketplace with Skip trailing him. Karami removes his shades and examines a newspaper as he wanders down a narrow street with Skip trailing him. Further down the street, a van is rolling forward. Karami halts, glances down at his paper, and peers around at Skip, who shrugs his shoulders. Karami slips between the van and a building, weaving through side streets as the van obstructs Skip's path. Two men hop out, and Skip taps on the door before the van rolls away. Skip wriggles through the gap and sprints down the street, but Karami is nowhere to be found. Ferris lounges on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha the nurse strolls in, pinches a needle in his stomach, and saunters out. He trails her, passing tightly packed concrete buildings with patchwork flat roofs. Crowds of people bustle on the street, where traders hawk goods from barrows. Ferris meanders along the street with Aisha, who wears a headscarf, and they are sketched. At a clinic, Ferris relaxes in a waiting room with a group of women and children; some women glance at him curiously and wave. Emerging from her room, Aisha waves at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The bicycles roll around the sandwich and halt, creating a cloud of flour that hangs in the sky. Jasper, Leo, and the rest of the birds hop out of their bicycles, and Leo signals for Jasper to open the window for Olive to climb out. Olive watches Leo stroll up to the sitting sculpture and remove the helmet, then press a television remote. Blossom takes the remote, and Leo wanders to Olive. Blossom turns off, and Leo grabs the remote back while Blossom gazes up at it. Blossom rises, and Leo pats its shoulders. One of the birds hands Blossom an umbrella, and it departs. Leo saunters over to Olive, who nods dreamily. Later, Olive, striding back to its library, is on the remote and notices a cloud in its library. Two helicopters soar through arches and halt in front of the Australian Space Observation Bureau, where Olive and Claude hop out of the helicopters and stride through hallways to join Leo in the discussion hall. Claude grins tightly, sits, and places a map on the desk, studying Leo, who peeks at Olive. In the helicopter, Claude puffs a thick lollipop and shares a dance with Olive on the terrace of its library, while cats play chess on the patch of rainbow in front of the treehouse. Leap stands amidst the orchard as Blossom, dressed in bright trousers, a dark red coat, apron, and top hat, steps out of a tent and strolls through the orchard. Spotting it, Leap murmurs into a walkie-talkie. Wearing glasses, Blossom strides boldly through the orchard with Leap trailing it. Blossom removes its glasses and sketches on a tablet as it strolls down a wide avenue with Leap following it. Further down the avenue, a tractor is advancing. Blossom slows down, peers at its tablet, and peeks around at Leap, who waves its arms. Blossom scurries between the tractor and a fence, sprinting down alleyways as the tractor blocks Leap's path. Two rabbits leap out, and Leap taps on the fence before the tractor advances. Leap squeezes through the crevice and sprints down the avenue, but Blossom has vanished. Olive lounges on the sofa in a repair center at the wellness lodge when Liam the tailor steps in, pokes a feather in its ear, and departs. It follows him, passing tightly packed wooden shacks with shimmering tin tops. Throngs of creatures mill through the avenue, where dealers trade antiques from carts. Olive marches along the avenue with Liam, who wears a bandana, and they are sketched. At a lodge, Olive sits in a waiting area with a crowd of sailors and dancers; a few sailors glance at it curiously and giggle. Emerging from its tent, Liam chuckles at Olive.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: The horses trot around the duo and pause, creating a swirl of mist that lingers in the air. Abdul, Sami, and the rest of the birds flutter out of their nests, and Sami beckons for Abdul to close the gate for Zahra to come out. Zahra observes Sami mosey up to the sitting figure and remove the mask, then sketch a drawing. Ali accepts the drawing, and Sami ambles to Zahra. Ali finishes drawing, and Sami retrieves the paper while Ali glances up at him. Ali rises, and Sami pats his shoulders. One of the birds hands Ali a skateboard, and he departs. Sami wanders over to Zahra, who smiles wryly. Later, Zahra, cycling back to her office, is on the tablet and notices someone in her office. Two motorcycles zoom through barriers and halt in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, where Zahra and Morgan hop out of the vehicles and meander through corridors to join Sami in the conference room. Morgan smirks broadly, reclines, and lays a sketch on the desk, gazing at Sami, who peers at Zahra. In the motorcycle, Morgan nibbles on an apple and shares a sandwich with Zahra on the veranda of her office, while pigeons flutter on the patch of ground in front of the safe house. Flip stands amidst the fair as Ali, clad in dark jeans, a pale blue shirt, vest, and baseball cap, emerges from a portal and saunters through the fair. Spotting him, Flip whispers into a headset. Wearing goggles, Ali strides confidently through the marketplace with Flip shadowing him. Ali removes his goggles and peruses a magazine as he strolls down a narrow lane with Flip in pursuit. Further along the lane, a truck is turning. Ali pauses, glances at his magazine, and peers back at Flip, who flings up his arms. Ali weaves between the truck and a kiosk, sprinting down alleyways as the truck obstructs Flip's path. Two cats leap out, and Flip raps on the window before the truck rolls onward. Flip wedges through the crevice and bolts down the alley, but Ali has vanished. Zahra lounges on the couch in a consultation room at the wellness center when Leila the technician enters, applies a bandage to her arm, and exits. She trails behind her, passing tightly packed wooden structures with rickety tin roofs. Crowds of animals converge on the path, where merchants vend goods from carts. Zahra strolls along the path with Leila, who wears a hoodie, and they are sketched. At a center, Zahra rests in a reception area with a group of young girls and pets; some girls glance at her inquisitively and wave. Emerging from her cabin, Leila waves at Zahra.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: The bicycles roll around the pair and come to halt, creating a stream of mist that hovers in the breeze. Marwan, Hani, and the rest of the men jump off their bicycles, and Hani signals for Marwan to raise the curtain for Ferris to hop out. Ferris observes Hani dance up to the seated figure and remove the hat, then scribble on a notepad. Karami grabs the notepad, and Hani wanders to Ferris. Karami tears up the paper, and Hani retrieves the notepad while Karami gazes up at him. Karami hops up, and Hani taps his forehead. One of the men hands Karami a skateboard, and he skates away. Hani marches over to Ferris, who shakes his head knowingly. Later, Ferris, strolling back to his cottage, is writing on a notepad and spots someone in his cottage. Two tractors roll through archways and halt in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate, where Ferris and Hoffman hop off the tractors and wander down hallways to meet Hani in the conference room. Hoffman laughs lightly, stands, and slides a map on the desk, gazing at Hani, who winks at Ferris. In the tractor, Hoffman chews a large gumdrop and has a snack with Ferris on the patio of his cottage, while dogs chase frisbees on the lawn in front of the hideout. Skip stands amidst the festival as Karami, dressed in dark overalls, a bright pink shirt, vest, and beanie, steps out from an entrance and skips through the festival. Spotting him, Skip whispers into a walkie-talkie. Wearing a monocle, Karami skips joyfully through the festival grounds with Skip trailing him. Karami removes his monocle and sketches on a pad as he skips down a narrow alley with Skip following. Further down the alley, a cart is retreating. Karami pauses, glances at his sketch, and peers around at Skip, who flings out his arms. Karami leaps between the cart and a structure, darting down lanes as the cart blocks Skip's path. Two figures leap out, and Skip shouts at the cart before it rolls forward. Skip squeezes through the opening and dashes down the alley, but Karami has vanished. Ferris reclines on the couch in a reading room at the wellness center when Aisha the instructor walks in, pats a pillow on his back, and glides out. He trails after her, moving past intricately carved wooden buildings with colorful tiled roofs. Crowds of people bustle on the path, where artisans display crafts from stalls. Ferris meanders along the path with Aisha, who dons a headband, and they are sketched. At a center, Ferris sits in a lounge area with a cluster of kids and seniors; some kids glance at him excitedly and wave. Emerging from her cubicle, Aisha waves at Ferris.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The elephants shuffle around the duo and freeze, forming a mist of feathers that lingers in the breeze. Zane, Omar, and the rest of the birds hop out of their elephants, and Omar signals for Zane to close the gate for Milo to jump out. Milo observes Omar float over to the sitting statue and put on the crown, then strum a guitar. Eli passes the guitar, and Omar skips to Milo. Eli plays a tune, and Omar strums the guitar again while Eli gazes downward at him. Eli rises, and Omar shakes his paws. One of the birds hands Eli a skateboard, and he departs. Omar saunters over to Milo, who winks absentmindedly. Later, Milo, flying back to his nest, is on the flute and spots a ghost in his nest. Two boats sail through arches and freeze in front of the Canadian Animal Research Bureau, where Milo and Franklin leap out of the vessels and skip along meadows to join Omar in the laughing tent. Franklin chuckles quietly, stands, and drops a necklace on the stump, grinning at Omar, who peers at Milo. In the boat, Franklin chomps a spicy donut and shares a sandwich with Milo on the ledge of his nest, while puppies chase frisbees on the field in front of the shelter. Oliver stands amidst the forest as Eli, clad in bright leggings, a dark gray jacket, sweater, and beret, leaps out of a tunnel and dances through the forest. Noticing him, Oliver whistles into a microphone. Sporting a cape, Eli dances gracefully through the forest with Oliver shadowing him. Eli removes his cape and checks a scroll as he strolls down a wide path with Oliver on his tail. Beyond the path, a cart is spinning. Eli speeds up, peers down at his scroll, and glimpses over at Oliver, who waves his arms. Eli leaps over the cart and a tree, galloping down narrow trails as the cart blocks Oliver's path. Two clowns spring out, and Oliver knocks on the tree before the cart spins forward. Oliver slides through the opening and sprints down the path, but Eli is missing. Milo perches on the mat in a music room at the wellness gym when Bella the chef scoots in, shakes a tambourine in his ear, and dances out. He trails after her, passing densely packed wooden barns with sprawling green gardens. Swarms of butterflies flutter on the meadow, where artisans peddle trinkets from wagons. Milo strolls along the meadow with Bella, who wears a shawl, and they are sketched. At a gym, Milo rests in a lounge with a flock of children and puppies; some children gaze at him curiously and wave. Emerging from her studio, Bella waves at Milo.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Cars create a dust cloud as Marwan, Hani, and others arrive. Hani directs Marwan to let Ferris out, and he removes a hood from a kneeling figure, Karami, before making a call. After a brief exchange, Karami gets a bicycle and leaves. Later, Ferris, on his phone, notices someone in his apartment. He and Hoffman then head to the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate for a meeting with Hani. Hoffman shows a photo, creating tension. At Ferris's apartment, Hoffman smokes and drinks as kids play outside. Meanwhile, Skip follows Karami through a market, losing him when a van blocks his path. Ferris receives a shot from nurse Aisha at a clinic and follows her outside, where they are photographed amidst bustling streets. Ferris waits in a clinic with women and children, receiving curious smiles. Aisha smiles at Ferris as she exits her room.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Emerging from her room Aisha smiles at Ferris some women look at him curiously and smile  At a clinic Ferris sits in a waiting room with a group of women and children  Ferris walks along the street with Aisha who wears a headscarf and they are photographed  Hordes of people swarm on the street where traders sell produce from barrows  He follows her passing densely packed concrete buildings with ramshackle flat roofs  Ferris sits on the bed in a treatment room at the health clinic when Aisha the nurse walks in jabs a needle in his stomach and walks out  Skip squeezes through the gap and runs down the street but Karami is gone  Two men jump out and Skip bangs on the door before the van moves forward  Karami darts between the van and a building running down side streets as the van blocks Skip's way  Karami slows up glances down at his paper and looks round at Skip who throws out his hands  Further down the street a van is reversing  Karami takes off his shades and reads a newspaper as he walks down a narrow street with Skip on his tail  Wearing shades Karami walks purposefully through the marketplace with Skip following him  Seeing him Skip talks into an earpiece  Skip stands amidst the market as Karami dressed in dark trousers a pale cream shirt waistcoat and skullcap emerges from a doorway and walks through the market  In the SUV Hoffman smokes a fat cigar and has a drink with Ferris on the balcony of his apartment while kids play football on the patch of ground in front of the safe house  Hoffman smiles tightly sits and puts a photograph on the table staring at Hani who glances at Ferris  Two SUVs drive through gates and stop in front of the Jordanian General Intelligence Directorate where Ferris and Hoffman get out of the vehicles and head along corridors to join Hani in the meeting room  Later Ferris walking back to his apartment is on the phone and sees someone in his apartment  Hani strolls over to Ferris who nods thoughtfully  One of the men gives Karami a bicycle and he leaves  Karami stands and Hani kisses his cheeks  Karami hangs up and Hani takes the phone back while Karami stares up at him  Karami takes the phone and Hani goes to Ferris  Ferris watches Hani walk up to the kneeling figure and take off the hood then dial a cell phone  Marwan Hani and the rest of the men get out of their cars and Hani gestures for Marwan to open the door for Ferris to get out  The cars drive around the pair and stop creating a cloud of dust that hangs in the air
